title: guardian typeface
content:
Can anyone suggest anything similar to Guardian egyptian that might be available to buy?

Thanks  
Clare
author: clare.holmes

comments.content: Seems Oranda (Bitstream) has a similar way of working. May not be as close as you want though. [http://www.paratype.com/btstore/default.asp?fcode=210&search=Oranda](http://web.archive.org/web/20060104061347/http:/www.paratype.com/btstore/default.asp?fcode=210&search=Oranda)
